title: Mimimi ~The Tale of a Cat and a Robot~
original_name: みみみ 猫とロボと小説～
sinopse:
After the world of Man ended, there came the world of Cats and Robots.
"Mimimi" is an inquisitive young cat who lives and works in this world as a reporter.
One day, Mimimi is tasked with interviewing the popular yet highly mysterious novelist, Robert Arl...
